Brightcove Beacon Plans

In this topic, you will about the different plans available when signing up for Brightcove Beacon.

Overview

Brightcove Beacon is available with the following plans:

  • Essential - Experiences only allow branding for the content owner. This is a cost-effective plan for the following organizations:

    • Have smaller budgets
    • Don't have significant existing brand recognition
    • New entrants to the market

    • Have no plans or ability to effectively monetize through advertising

  • Advanced - Provides additional features in your apps and the back end

    • Includes an expanded choice of layouts
    • Ideal for media companies and regional broadcasters with established audiences and advertising monetization plans

Brightcove Beacon Feature Summary

The following table shows the features that are provided with the Essential and Advanced plans:

Brightcove Beacon Feature Summary
Feature Essential Advanced
Monetization modes
Freemium
SVOD (Subscription Video On Demand)
AVOD (Advertising Video On Demand)/
SSAI (Server-Side Ad Insertion)
Playback modes
VOD (Video On Demand)
Live Ready
EPG (Electronic Program Guide)
Live events
Episodic content
Advanced apps
App store integrations
Stripe integration
Video Cloud entitlements
Video Cloud Essentials
Video Cloud Select

Notes

[1] SVOD purchases through app stores and website with Stripe

[2] Live hours sold separately. EPG only works with live (not VOD)

[3] Live events automate the workflow. Requires Live hours

[4] Live events automate the workflow. Requires Live hours

[5] Channels are for live streams

[6] AVOD and Video Cloud SSAI entitlements are not included

[7] Game consoles are on 2020 road map. Android TV STBs (Set Top Box) require BGS (Brightcove Global Services) Customization

[8] User required to provide their own Stripe account

[9] User required to bring their own Google Analytics account. Free and paid versions are supported.
